nl.tue.geometrycore.graphs.dcel

Class DCELGraph<TGeom extends OrientedGeometry,TVertex extends DCELVertex<TGeom,TVertex,TDart,TFace>,TDart extends DCELDart<TGeom,TVertex,TDart,TFace>,TFace extends DCELFace<TGeom,TVertex,TDart,TFace>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.geometrycore.graphs.dcel.DCELGraph<TGeom,TVertex,TDart,TFace>
  • Type Parameters:
    TGeom - The geometry of an edge, must inherit from OrientedGeometry
    TVertex - The class of a vertex
    TDart - The class of a dart
    TFace - The class of a face

    public abstract class DCELGraph<TGeom extends OrientedGeometry,TVertex extends DCELVertex<TGeom,TVertex,TDart,TFace>,TDart extends DCELDart<TGeom,TVertex,TDart,TFace>,TFace extends DCELFace<TGeom,TVertex,TDart,TFace>>
extends java.lang.Object

      • sortToContainmentOrder

        public void sortToContainmentOrder()
        This method ensures a containment order on faces. In other words, suppose that face F that encloses another face H, then F will come before H in the list of faces. This operation takes O(n) time, for n faces.
